name: Buena Fiesta
text: On Play: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 FILM type card other than [Buena Fiesta] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at top 5 cards, reveal up to 1 FILM card (not Buena Fiesta), add to hand, rest to bottom in any order.
